message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere within my budget. I am willing to pay $8000 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $9000.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I am able to offer $8500 for the product.
I understand you're getting close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another adjustment. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $9200.
Thank you for your continued flexibility, Alice. I am willing to pay $8750 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more adjustment. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $9100.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I am willing to pay $8800 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more adjustment. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $9000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I am willing to pay $8900 for the product.
